targets.query: SELECT last("startedT") AS "startedT" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT last("startedT")-last("endedT") AS "minAT" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' AND $timeFilter  AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' and $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError")/sum("count")*100 AS "rate" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all'  AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/
SELECT last("startedT")-last("endedT") as "Active threads" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(usage_idle) as "CPU Usage" FROM cpu WHERE $timeFilter AND host='telegraf-loadgenerator' group by time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(available_percent) as "Memory Usage" FROM mem WHERE $timeFilter AND host='telegraf-loadgenerator' group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError") as "Error count" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT max(/$metric$/)  FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='$transactions' AND "statut"='all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)

SELECT
sum("count") as NumberOfSamples,
mean(avg) as Average,
percentile("pct90.0", 90) as pct90,
percentile("pct95.0", 95) as pct95, 
percentile("pct99.0", 99) as pct99,
min(min) as Min,
max(max) as Max,
sum(countError)/sum(count) as Error
FROM "$measurement"
WHERE "statut"='all' 
AND $timeFilter
AND transaction !~ /(all|\/)/
AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ 
GROUP BY "transaction"

SELECT sum(count) AS errorCount FROM "$measurement" WHERE ("responseMessage" <> '' OR  "responseCode" =~ /(4|5)\\d{2}/) AND transaction !~ /.*(?i)transaction/ AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/  GROUP BY transaction, responseCode, responseMessage
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/  GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT last("count")/5 as "Throughput"FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT max(avg) as "Average"  FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' AND "statut"='all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT last("startedT")-last("endedT") as "Active threads" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError") as "Errors count" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ group by time($group_time)
SELECT last("count")/5 as "Throughput" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter AND "application" =~ /$scenario/ GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)

panels.title: Response time vs Active threads vs Throughput vs Error rate

rows.title: Response time vs Active threads vs Error rate

targets.query: SELECT 100-mean(usage_idle) as "CPU Usage" FROM cpu WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host , time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(available_percent) as "Memory Usage" FROM mem WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host, time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(usage_idle) as usage FROM cpu WHERE $timeFilter and host='$host'GROUP BY time($group_time)
SELECT mean(usage_percent)/$cores_number FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter and host='$host' GROUP BY time($group_time),container_name
SELECT  100-mean(available_percent) as "usage" FROM mem WHERE $timeFilter AND host='$host' group by time($group_time)
SELECT mean(usage_percent) FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE $timeFilter and host='$host' GROUP BY container_name, time($group_time)

list.name: transactions
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "transaction" where transaction !~ /(internal|all|\/)/
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "transaction" where transaction !~ /(internal|all|\/)/ and application= '$tag'

list.name: cores_number
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = cores_number

title: Load test monitoring With Docker Containers Monitoring
